00028 
00047 
00048 PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::PrecipitateDissolutionModeling(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron)       
00049 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00050 {
00051    // Control sentence
00052 
00053    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00054    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00055 
00056    if(numberOfInputs != 1 || numberOfOutputs != 1)
00057    {
00058       std::cerr << std::endl
00059                 << "Flood Error: PrecipitateDissolutionModeling class." << std::endl
00060                 << "PrecipitateDissolutionModeling(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00061                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be 0." << std::endl
00062                 << std::endl;
00063 
00064       exit(1);
00065    }
00066 
00067    numberOfSamples = 0;
00068 
00069    universalGasConstant = 8.314e-3; // kJ / mol K
00070 
00071 
00072    referenceTemperature = 0.0; // K
00073    referenceTime = 0.0; // s
00074 
00075    minimumVickersHardness = 0.0;
00076    maximumVickersHardness = 0.0;
00077 
00078    minkowskiParameter = 2.0;
00079 
00080    minkowskiErrorWeight = 1.0;
00081    regularizationWeight = 0.0;
00082 }
00083

00109    referenceTemperature = 623.0; // K
00110 
00111    minimumVickersHardness = 73.8;
00112    maximumVickersHardness = 203.1;

00114    minkowskiParameter = 2.0;

00271 // void setMinkowskiParameter(double) method
00272 
00277 
00278 void PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::setMinkowskiParameter(double newMinkowskiParameter)
00279 {
00280    // Control sentence
00281 
00282    if(newMinkowskiParameter < 1.0 || newMinkowskiParameter > 2.0)
00283    {
00284       std::cerr << std::endl
00285                 << "Flood Error. PrecipitateDissolutionModeling class." << std::endl
00286                 << "void setMinkowskiParameter(double) method." << std::endl
00287                 << "The Minkowski parameter must be comprised between 1 and 2" << std::endl
00288                 << std::endl;
00289     
00290       exit(1);
00291    }
00292 
00293    // Set Minkowski parameter
00294 
00295    minkowskiParameter = newMinkowskiParameter;
00296 }

00305 void PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::setMinkowskiErrorWeight(double newMinkowskiErrorWeight)
00306 {

00308 
00309    if(newMinkowskiErrorWeight <= 0.0)
00310    {

00312                 << "Flood Error PrecipitateDissolutionModeling class." << std::endl
00313                 << "void setMinkowskiErrorWeight(double) method." << std::endl
00314                 << "The Minkowski error term weight must be greater than zero." 
00315                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00316 
00317       exit(1);
00318    }
00319 
00320    // Set Minkowski error term weight
00321 
00322    minkowskiErrorWeight = newMinkowskiErrorWeight;
00323 }

00354 // void loadVickersHardnessTest(char*)
00355 
00372 
00373 void PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::loadVickersHardnessTest(char* filename)
00374 {
00375    std::fstream file;
00376 
00377    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
00378 
00379    if(!file.is_open())
00380    {
00381       std::cout << std::endl
00382                 << "void loadVickersHardnessTest(char*) method." 
00383                 << std::endl
00384                 << "Cannot open Vickers hardness test data file."  << std::endl
00385                 << std::endl;
00386 
00387       exit(1);
00388    }
00389    else
00390    {
00391       if(display)
00392       {
00393          std::cout << std::endl
00394                    << "Loading Vickers harndess test from file..." << std::endl;
00395       }
00396    }
00397 
00398 
00399    std::string word;
00400 
00401    // Minimum Vickers hardness
00402 
00403    while(word != "MinimumVickersHardness:")
00404    {
00405       file >> word;
00406    }
00407  
00408    file >> minimumVickersHardness;
00409 
00410    // Maximum Vickers hardness
00411 
00412    file >> word;
00413 
00414    file >> maximumVickersHardness;
00415 
00416    // Reference time
00417 
00418    file >> word;
00419 
00420    file >> referenceTime;
00421 
00422    // Reference temperature
00423 
00424    file >> word;
00425 
00426    file >> referenceTemperature;
00427 
00428    referenceTemperature += 273.16;
00429 
00430    // Number of samples
00431 
00432    file >> word;
00433 
00434    file >> numberOfSamples;
00435 
00436    // Experimental data
00437 
00438    file >> word;
00439 
00440    Vector<double> newTemperatureData(numberOfSamples);
00441    Vector<double> newTimeData(numberOfSamples);
00442    Vector<double> newVickersHardnessData(numberOfSamples);
00443 
00444    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00445    {
00446       file >> newTemperatureData[i];
00447       file >> newTimeData[i];
00448       file >> newVickersHardnessData[i];
00449 
00450      newTemperatureData[i] += 273.16;
00451    }
00452 
00453    temperatureData = newTemperatureData;
00454    timeData = newTimeData;
00455    vickersHardnessData = newVickersHardnessData;
00456 
00457    file.close();
00458 }
00459 
00460 
00461 // double getFullDissolutionTime(double) method
00462 
00466 
00467 double PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::getFullDissolutionTime(double temperature)
00468 {
00469    double fullDissolutionTime = 0.0;
00470 
00471    double effectiveActivationEnergy = multilayerPerceptron->getSingleIndependentParameter(0);
00472 
00473    fullDissolutionTime = referenceTime
00474    *exp((effectiveActivationEnergy/universalGasConstant)*(1.0/temperature-1.0/referenceTemperature));
00475 
00476    return(fullDissolutionTime);
00477 }
00478 
00479 
00480 // double getVolumetricFraction(double) method
00481 
00485 
00486 double PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::getVolumetricFraction(double vickersHardness)
00487 {
00488    double volumetricFraction 
00489    = (vickersHardness - minimumVickersHardness)/(maximumVickersHardness - minimumVickersHardness);
00490 
00491    return(volumetricFraction);
00492 }
00493 
00494 
00495 // double getVickersHardness(double) method
00496 
00500 
00501 double PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::getVickersHardness(double volumetricFraction)
00502 {
00503    double vickersHardness = minimumVickersHardness 
00504    + (maximumVickersHardness-minimumVickersHardness)*(1.0 - volumetricFraction);
00505 
00506    return(vickersHardness);
00507 }
00508 
00509 
00510 // Vector<double> getNormalizedTimeData(void) method
00511 
00514 
00515 Vector<double> PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::getNormalizedTimeData(void)
00516 {
00517    Vector<double> normalizedTimeData(numberOfSamples);
00518 
00519    double fullDissolutionTime = 0.0;
00520 
00521    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00522    {
00523       fullDissolutionTime = getFullDissolutionTime(temperatureData[i]); 
00524 
00525       normalizedTimeData[i] = log10(timeData[i]/fullDissolutionTime);
00526    }
00527 
00528    return(normalizedTimeData);
00529 }
00530 
00531 
00532 // Vector<double> getVolumetricFractionData(void) method
00533 
00536 
00537 Vector<double> PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::getVolumetricFractionData(void)
00538 {
00539    Vector<double> volumetricFractionData(numberOfSamples);
00540 
00541    Vector<double> normalizedTimeData = getNormalizedTimeData();
00542 
00543    double volumetricFraction = 0.0;
00544 
00545    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00546    {
00547       volumetricFraction = getVolumetricFraction(vickersHardnessData[i]);
00548     
00549       volumetricFractionData[i] = 1.0 - volumetricFraction;
00550    }
00551 
00552    return(volumetricFractionData);
00553 }
00554 
00555 
00556 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00557 
00562 
00563 double PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::calculateEvaluation()
00564 {
00565     // Control sentence 
00566 
00567    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00568    {
00569       std::cerr << std::endl
00570                 << "Flood Error: PrecipitateDissolutionModeling class." << std::endl
00571                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00572                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00573                 << std::endl;
00574 
00575         exit(1);
00576    }
00577 
00578 
00579     numberOfEvaluations++;
00580 
00581    double evaluation = 0.0;
00582 
00583    Vector<double> normalizedTimeData = getNormalizedTimeData();
00584    Vector<double> volumetricFractionData = getVolumetricFractionData();
00585 
00586    Vector<double> input(1);
00587    Vector<double> output(1);
00588 
00589    Vector<double> volumetricFractionModel(numberOfSamples);
00590 
00591    double minkowskiError = 0.0;
00592 
00593    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00594    {
00595       input[0] = normalizedTimeData[i];
00596       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00597       
00598       volumetricFractionModel[i] = output[0];
00599 
00600       minkowskiError += pow(fabs(volumetricFractionData[i] - volumetricFractionModel[i]), minkowskiParameter);
00601    }
00602 
00603    minkowskiError = pow(minkowskiError/(double)numberOfSamples, 1.0/minkowskiParameter);
00604   
00605    Vector<double> neuralParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNeuralParameters();
00606 
00607    double neuralParametersNorm = neuralParameters.calculateNorm();
00608 
00609    evaluation = minkowskiErrorWeight*minkowskiError + regularizationWeight*neuralParametersNorm;
00610 
00611    return(evaluation);
00612 }

00615 // void printVickersHardnessTest(void) method
00616 
00629 
00630 void PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::printVickersHardnessTest(void)
00631 {
00632    std::cout << std::endl;
00633 
00634    std::cout << "Dissolution modeling. Vickers hardness test." << std::endl;
00635 
00636    std::cout << "Minimum Vickers hardness:" << std::endl 
00637              << minimumVickersHardness << std::endl;
00638 
00639    std::cout << "Maximum Vickers hardness:" << std::endl 
00640              << maximumVickersHardness << std::endl;
00641 
00642    std::cout << "Reference time [s]:" << std::endl 
00643              << referenceTime << std::endl;
00644 
00645    std::cout << "Reference temperature [K]:" << std::endl 
00646              << referenceTemperature << std::endl;
00647 
00648    std::cout << "Number of samples:" << std::endl 
00649              << numberOfSamples << std::endl;
00650 
00651    std::cout << "Experimental data:" << std::endl;
00652  
00653    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00654    {
00655       std::cout << temperatureData[i] << " " << timeData[i] << " " << vickersHardnessData[i] << std::endl;
00656    }
00657 }

00675 // void savePrecipitateDissolutionModel(char*) method
00676 
00683 
00684 void PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::savePrecipitateDissolutionModel(char* filename)
00685 {
00686    std::fstream file; 
00687 
00688    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00689 
00690    // Control sentence
00691 
00692    if(!file.is_open())
00693    {
00694       std::cout << std::endl
00695                 << "Cannot open precipitate dissolution model data file."
00696                 << std::endl;
00697       
00698       exit(1);
00699    }
00700    else
00701    {
00702       std::cout << std::endl
00703                 << "Saving precipitate dissolution model to data file..."
00704                 << std::endl;
00705    }
00706 
00707 
00708    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00709    Vector<int> numbersOfHiddenNeurons = multilayerPerceptron->getNumbersOfHiddenNeurons();
00710    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00711 
00712    double effectiveActivationEnergy = multilayerPerceptron->getSingleIndependentParameter(0);
00713 
00714    Vector<double> normalizedTimeData = getNormalizedTimeData();
00715    Vector<double> volumetricFractionData = getVolumetricFractionData();
00716 
00717    Vector<double> input(1);
00718    Vector<double> output(1);
00719 
00720    Vector<double> volumetricFractionModel(numberOfSamples);
00721 
00722    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00723    {
00724       input[0] = normalizedTimeData[i];
00725       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00726 
00727       volumetricFractionModel[i] = output[0];
00728    }
00729 
00730    // Sort data
00731 
00732    Vector<double> sortedNormalizedTimeData = normalizedTimeData;
00733 
00734    std::sort(sortedNormalizedTimeData.begin(), sortedNormalizedTimeData.end(), std::less<double>());
00735 
00736    Vector<double> sortedVolumetricFractionData(numberOfSamples);
00737    Vector<double> sortedVolumetricFractionModel(numberOfSamples);
00738 
00739    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00740    {
00741       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfSamples; j++)
00742       {
00743          if(normalizedTimeData[j] == sortedNormalizedTimeData[i])
00744          {
00745             sortedVolumetricFractionData[i] = volumetricFractionData[j];
00746             sortedVolumetricFractionModel[i] = volumetricFractionModel[j];
00747          }
00748       }
00749    }
00750 
00751    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Precipitate Dissolution Model Data File." << std::endl;
00752 
00753    file << "% Network architecture: " << numberOfInputs << ":" << numbersOfHiddenNeurons << ":" << numberOfOutputs << std::endl;
00754    
00755    file << "% Effective activation energy: " << effectiveActivationEnergy << std::endl;
00756 
00757    file << std::endl
00758        << "% Column data: " << std::endl
00759        << "% 1. Experimental X" << std::endl
00760        << "% 2. Experimental Y" << std::endl;
00761 
00762    
00763    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00764    {
00765      file << normalizedTimeData[i] << " " << volumetricFractionData[i] << std::endl;
00766    }
00767 
00768    file << std::endl
00769        << "% Column data: " << std::endl
00770        << "% 1. Normalized time (log(t/t*))" << std::endl
00771        << "% 2. Volumetric fraction (1-f/f0)" << std::endl;
00772 
00773    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00774    {
00775      file << sortedNormalizedTimeData[i] << " " << sortedVolumetricFractionData[i] << std::endl;
00776    }
00777 
00778    file.close();
00779 }

00782 // void saveVickersHardnessModel(char*) method
00783 
00790 
00791 void PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::saveVickersHardnessModel(char* filename)
00792 {
00793    std::fstream file; 
00794 
00795    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00796 
00797    // Control sentence
00798 
00799    if(!file.is_open())
00800    {
00801       std::cout << std::endl
00802                 << "Cannot open Vickers hardness model data file."
00803                 << std::endl;
00804       
00805       exit(1);
00806    }
00807    else
00808    {
00809       std::cout << std::endl
00810                 << "Saving Vickers hardness model to data file..."
00811                 << std::endl;
00812    }
00813 
00814    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00815    Vector<int> numbersOfHiddenNeurons = multilayerPerceptron->getNumbersOfHiddenNeurons();
00816    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00817 
00818    double effectiveActivationEnergy = multilayerPerceptron->getSingleIndependentParameter(0);
00819 
00820    Vector<double> normalizedTimeData = getNormalizedTimeData();
00821    Vector<double> volumetricFractionData = getVolumetricFractionData();
00822 
00823    Vector<double> input(1);
00824    Vector<double> output(1);
00825 
00826    Vector<double> volumetricFractionModel(numberOfSamples);
00827 
00828    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00829    {
00830       input[0] = normalizedTimeData[i];
00831       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00832 
00833       volumetricFractionModel[i] = output[0];
00834    }
00835 
00836    // Sort data
00837 
00838    Vector<double> sortedNormalizedTimeData = normalizedTimeData;
00839 
00840    std::sort(sortedNormalizedTimeData.begin(), sortedNormalizedTimeData.end(), std::less<double>());
00841 
00842    Vector<double> sortedVolumetricFractionData(numberOfSamples);
00843    Vector<double> sortedVolumetricFractionModel(numberOfSamples);
00844 
00845    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00846    {
00847       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfSamples; j++)
00848       {
00849          if(normalizedTimeData[j] == sortedNormalizedTimeData[i])
00850          {
00851             sortedVolumetricFractionData[i] = volumetricFractionData[j];
00852             sortedVolumetricFractionModel[i] = volumetricFractionModel[j];
00853          }
00854       }
00855    }
00856 
00857    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Precipitate Dissolution Model Data File." << std::endl;
00858 
00859    file << "% Network architecture: " << numberOfInputs << ":" << numbersOfHiddenNeurons << ":" << numberOfOutputs << std::endl;
00860    
00861    file << "% Effective activation energy: " << effectiveActivationEnergy << std::endl;
00862 
00863    file << std::endl
00864         << "% Column data: " << std::endl
00865         << "% 1. Normalized time data (log(t/t*))" << std::endl
00866         << "% 2. Vickers hardness data" << std::endl;
00867 
00868    
00869    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00870    {
00871      file << normalizedTimeData[i] << " " << vickersHardnessData[i] << std::endl;
00872    }
00873 
00874    file << std::endl
00875         << "% Column data: " << std::endl
00876         << "% 1. Sorted normalized time data (log(t/t*))" << std::endl
00877         << "% 2. Sorted Vickers hardness model" << std::endl;
00878 
00879    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00880    {
00881      file << sortedNormalizedTimeData[i] << " " << getVickersHardness(sortedVolumetricFractionModel[i]) << std::endl;
00882    }
00883 
00884    file.close();
00885 }

00888 // void saveInverseVickersHardnessTest(char*) method
00889 
00894 
00895 void PrecipitateDissolutionModeling::saveInverseVickersHardnessTest(char* filename)
00896 {
00897    std::fstream file; 
00898 
00899    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00900 
00901    // Control sentence
00902 
00903    if(!file.is_open())
00904    {
00905       std::cout << std::endl
00906                 << "Cannot open reverse Vickers hardness test data file."
00907                 << std::endl;
00908       
00909       exit(1);
00910    }
00911    else
00912    {
00913       std::cout << std::endl
00914                 << "Saving reverse Vickers hardness test to data file..."
00915                 << std::endl;
00916    }
00917 
00918    int numberOfTemperatures = 7;
00919 
00920    Vector<double> temperature(numberOfTemperatures);
00921 
00922    temperature[0] = 200.0 + 273.16;
00923    temperature[1] = 250.0 + 273.16;
00924    temperature[2] = 300.0 + 273.16;
00925    temperature[3] = 350.0 + 273.16;
00926    temperature[4] = 400.0 + 273.16;
00927    temperature[5] = 450.0 + 273.16;
00928    temperature[6] = 500.0 + 273.16;
00929 
00930    int numberOfPoints = 11;
00931 
00932    Vector<double> time(numberOfPoints);
00933 
00934    time[0] = 1.0;
00935    time[1] = 5.0;
00936    time[2] = 10.0;
00937    time[3] = 50.0;
00938    time[4] = 100.0;
00939    time[5] = 500.0;
00940    time[6] = 1000.0;
00941    time[7] = 5000.0;
00942    time[8] = 10000.0;
00943    time[9] = 50000.0;
00944    time[10] = 100000.0;
00945 
00946    // Calculate and write inverse Vickers hardness test
00947 
00948    for(int i  = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00949    {
00950       file << time[i] << " ";
00951 
00952       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTemperatures; j++)
00953       {
00954          double fullDissolutionTime = getFullDissolutionTime(temperature[j]);
00955           
00956          Vector<double> input(1, log10(time[i]/fullDissolutionTime));
00957          Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00958              
00959          double volumetricFraction = output[0];
00960          double vickersHardness = getVickersHardness(volumetricFraction);
00961 
00962          file << vickersHardness << " ";
00963       }
00964  
00965       file << std::endl;
00966    }
00967 
00968    // Close file
00969 
00970    file.close();
00971 }
00972 
00973 }
